review_title: Great place to gain experience and meet like-minded people
pros: I have thoroughly enjoyed my experience working with The Scouts so far (voluntary). I can have as much responsibility as my time allows and am gaining lots of experience working with young people. I get to be involved in designing their badge curriculum and join in with activities and games - plus camping and sports etc. All of the adults working in The Scouts have similar interests so have met some great people too.
cons: Scouts evenings are always on Thursdays so if you have other commitments/work you must be available for at least some Thursdays. Also because everyone in Scouts is voluntary (at least at the local section stage), you can't really expect lots from other volunteers so can end up having to do more than a fair share of the admin/IT/clerical if others are not proficient in that area.
